name: Surf Excel Matic Front Load Liquid Detergent
description: Best suited for front load washing machines and ensures a superior laundry experience and offers the following benefits - 1. FASTER STAIN REMOVAL: New Surf Excel Matic liquid with a powerful cleaning technology penetrates stains faster and removes tough stains in the machine itself. 2. EASY & BETTER DISSOLUTION: It’s liquid format helps it dissolve easily in the high water level environment of washing machines, reaches stains effortlessly and leaves no residue on clothes or in machines. 3. SUPERIOR FRAGRANCE: It ensures that your clothes not only look fresh but also smell fresh and are safe on your hands. COLOUR CARE: It removes tough stains in machines but retains the original colour of the fabric. 4. MACHINE CARE: It leaves no residue, causing no scaling and produces the right amount of foam. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
